answers.answer: Did u talk to your doctor just in case it preclapse x

mine has been painfully swollen for like the last month. They checked me for preeclampsia last week, you may want to mention it and get tested yourself. otherwise soak in warm water with Epsom salt, ice, elevate, and cut your caffeine and salt intake. Most importantly it seems backwards, but drink 2 to 3 liters of water a day.
I just soak them in warm water , when I got a pedicure it really helped

question: My feet are so swollen they dont ever get back to normal ive tried raising them im 3 days away from my due date how do you come with swollen feet
title: anybody's feet extremely swollen?
